opening-times: The opening times are Mon - Fri 9am - 7pm every day, including holidays
animal-list: The zoo has 10 giraffes, 3 elephants, 2 lions and 12 penguins
ticket-prices: Tickets cost £20 for adults and £10 for children. Refunds are permitted 48 hours or more prior to entry time
directions: We are located at 1 Zoo Lane, London. There is free parking plus train and bus stations within 100 metres
contact-details: Contact us at info@megazoo.com or call 01234 567 890. We will be happy to help you
